conbody.p: video monitoringVideo monitoring mode allows the teacher to monitor web cam feeds from the student workstations (if the latter are equipped for it). Web cam feeds will be displayed in the student panels ( ).

fig.title: Student panel displaying web cam feed

image.alt: Student panel displaying web cam feed

conbody.p: Select Web cam from the student menu (see ) to monitor video feed for this particular student.
Press Remote control button in the group tab menu (see ) and select Remote control to monitor video feeds for selected group.
Press Remote control button in the class tab menu (see ) and select Web cam to monitor video feeds.
Double click on a student panel displaying a video feed to open this feed in a larger window.
Repeat the actions described above to turn off video feed display.
